name: Flurry Bird
description:
Birb

Press mouse/space/up arrow to move and to attack.
Ram into enemies with your sword extended 3 times to make them flee!

Frogs lick  (they turn red a second before!)

Bees try to catch you (press a few times to free yourself)

Cats jump (don't let them land on you!)

Have fun (not required)

PS. Sword hitboxes are a bit smaller than they appear

Updates:

-added frog indicator

-added easy mode

-added level difficulty sign

-added bonuses for harder levels

-fixed level difficulty decider
